dt-option.name: buttons.buttons.init
dt-option.summary: Initialisation function that can be used to add events specific to this button
dt-option.default: Default function depends upon the button type. Please refer to the button type documentation

type.scope: DataTables API instance for the selected button - i.e. `b-api button()` for the button in question
type.parameter: A DataTables API instance for the host DataTable
jQuery instance for the button node that was clicked on
type.returns: No return value is required or expected. No action is taken upon any value that is returned.
type.description: The function given here is called when the button is built (or re-built) and can therefore be used to attach custom events to the host DataTable (or any other object) which are specific to this button.

dt-option.description: This function provides the ability to button plug-in authors to run custom code when a button is initialised. This can be useful for attaching event handlers to the host DataTable that will update the button. For example, the buttons provided by the _Select_ extension for DataTables make use of this to create buttons types which are only active when there is one or more item in the DataTable selected.

example.title: Enable / disable based on there being selected rows (from the _Select_ extension)
